Title: Il marchese del Grillo
Writer: Bernardino Zapponi (story), Leonardo Benvenuti (story), Piero De Bernardi (story), Mario Monicelli (story), Tullio Pinelli (story), Leonardo Benvenuti (screenplay), Piero De Bernardi (screenplay), Mario Monicelli (screenplay), Tullio Pinelli (screenplay), Alberto Sordi (screenplay)
Actors: Alberto Sordi, Caroline Berg, Andrea Bevilacqua, Tommaso Bianco
Plot: The marquess of Grillo is a good-natured, clever and women-loving man who is always inventing stories and cracking all types of jokes. The film tells the story of his life.
